alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Izard; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 3:48AM CST until February 16 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 430 AM CST. * At 348 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Myron, or 7 miles west of Ash Flat, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherokee Village... Melbourne... Ash Flat... Horseshoe Bend... Highland in Sharp County... Hardy... Oxford... Franklin... Ballard... Myron... Lacrosse... Evening Shade... Agnos... Center... Morriston... Glencoe... Zion... Violet Hill... Poughkeepsie... Kittle... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for north central Arkansas.
